This shows the chunk option. Same command with normal .rmd file. Set `echo=FALSE` to exclude your R codes in the chunk.

```{r, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(knitr)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, 
                      cache.lazy = FALSE, dpi = 180)
options(width=120, dplyr.width = 150)
library(ggplot2)
library(silgelib)
theme_set(theme_roboto())
```


You can display it with `echo=TRUE`
```{r}
library(dplyr)

available.packages() %>% 
    tbl_df()
```
